name: BabyTracker
description: A web application that you can use to track your newborn's bowel, eating, and sleeping habits. ## News and Updates     02-Mar-2021 "Created CRUD operations for entity models, implemented users and roles from AspNet Idenitity, and implemented AuthN and AuthZ on controllers and razor pages."     16-Feb-2021 "Started the model property validations, as well as the infant view model factory."     13-Feb-2021 "Migrated the database seed data and initialized the database connection string."     12-Feb-2021 "Added the models Diaper, Feeding, Growth, Infant, Medication (no validations yet)"     03-Feb-2021 "Initialized the project."
